basics.name: David Liang
basics.label: BS Computer Engineering candidate at UH Manoa. </br> Graduation: Spring 2020
basics.summary: Hello there! My name is David and I am studying towards my B.S. in Computer Engineering at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Spring of 2020.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI

work.summary: Engage in cybersecurity training and research in respect to drone applications.
highlights: Collect drone communication data and analyze characteristic data trends with Python

work.summary: Modernizes the website of the University of Hawaiʻi at Mānoa Electrical Engineering Department.
highlights: Provide UI design solutions using Bootstrap and CodeIgniter frameworks
Propose solutions and accept feedback at bi-monthly website committee meetings

volunteer.organization: Eta Kappa Nu Electrical Engineering Honors Society, Delta Omega Chapter

awards.title: CyberCorps: Scholarship for Service
awards.summary: Awarded by the National Science Foundation to the next generation of IT, security, intelligence, and engineering professionals to fulfill the cybersecurity mission of the U.S. Government.

awards.title: Band Achievement Scholarship
awards.summary: Awarded by the University of Hawaiʻi Music Department via audition to incoming freshman students
